short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tiny browser extension to inline blog posts, news articles, etc. from reddit link posts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hey there, back with another extension for y'all! ðŸ‘‹

RIP is an extension for Reddit that will automagically insert the main content from external sites (like blogs, news articles, etc.) on "link posts".

You know, those posts that are only a link to another site. I got tired of having to click on these links all the time, just to wait for the page to load and all the ads to show. Never mind having to deal with the jankiness, popups, and different design that blogs and news sites have. So I made this to extract just the main reading content from those sites and inject it into the Reddit post for your viewing pleasure. I know â€” it's very heroic :)
